page.title: 02INDUSTRY IN SUTTON IN A.
page.content: Sutton has long associations with the hosiery industry,and was involved in the Luddite troubles (machine-breaking) which affected many parts of Notts.in the early 19th C. In the mid 1980s {hosiery}and{ {clothing manufacture}are still the main industries in the area,and provide job opportunities-especially for women-both full and part-time. Other important industries in the area are tinplate and various light engineering works.There is now only one working coal mine in the area but a number of men are employed in coal mines nearby. As is to be expected,with an urban area the size of Sutton in Ashfield there are numerous service industries-local government,banking,estate agencies etc. MARION ALLAN.
